definition: energy channels/meridian (TCM)/(dialect) trick/tactic
classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]
surname Jing
net-like object/to hold sth in place with a net/to wind/to twist/(TCM) channels in the human body
small net

sentences.english: The magnetic line can be extended to the channels and collaterals acupoints of people's vola.
sentences.chinese: 更將磁力線延伸到人們足底的經絡穴位。

sentences.english: The light will move through the meridians and cells allowing for the act of regeneration.
sentences.chinese: 光將會通過經絡和細胞運作，從而允許再生行爲發生。

sentences.english: Qi and blood in the body are the material basis for the physiological activities of the zang-fu and meridians.
sentences.chinese: 人體氣血是臟腑經絡生理活動的物質基礎。

sentences.english: How did people discover the invisible “jingluo” in human body?
sentences.chinese: 人們是怎麼發現人體中那無形的“經絡”的呢？

sentences.english: The basis of acupuncture is the theory of meridians and acupoints.
sentences.chinese: 鍼灸的理論基礎就是經絡腧穴理論。

sentences.english: There was meridian theoretical basis kidney protecting foetus.
sentences.chinese: 腎固胞胎也有其經絡理論基礎。

sentences.english: Be familiar with physiological functions and pathological changes of meridians and collaterals.
sentences.chinese: 熟悉經絡的生理功能，病理變化。

sentences.english: The large intestine has close relationship with the brain through body fluid and meridians and collaterals in TCM.
sentences.chinese: 在生理上中醫認爲大腸與腦通過津液和經絡密切相聯。

sentences.english: Clinical general the stroke divides into the internal organs and the channels and collaterals, but dialectical treats.
sentences.chinese: 臨牀上將中風分爲中臟腑和中經絡而辨證施治。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo investigate the structure of micro vessel in Houhai point and its relationship with meridians and collaterals.
sentences.chinese: 目的探索穴區內微血管構築及與經絡腧穴的關係。

sentences.english: Our specialist offers traditional Chinese massage to relax your channels and collaterals.
sentences.chinese: 專家門診，傳統手法推拿，按摩，舒展經絡。

sentences.english: Results This theory is used for meridian diagnosis and acupoint selection with the best therapeutic effects.
sentences.chinese: 結果該理論運用於經絡診斷和取穴治療效果甚佳。

sentences.english: The New York stock exchange is the world biggest stock market.
sentences.chinese: 對於交易所證券市場的經絡，那她更是“淵源有自”。

sentences.english: This study provided a data to clarify the essence of meridian and the mechanism of referred pain.
sentences.chinese: 爲闡明經絡生理實質及牽涉痛機理提供了可靠的證據。

sentences.english: Asking about locality of the pain helps understand pathological changes of internal organs and meridians;
sentences.chinese: 問疼痛的部位可以幫助瞭解臟腑經絡的病理改變。

sentences.english: Western medicine thinks all-diseases can be refll cted in the abnormality of bioelectricity ofaody.
sentences.chinese: 所有疾病都是人體經絡不通。

qi and blood (two basic bodily fluids of Chinese medicine)
inner organs

to prick with a needle/to treat by acupuncture
cervical vertebra/the seven cervical vertebrae in the neck of humans and most mammals
to harm/to damage/to injure/impairment/loss/disability
surface of the body/periphery of the body/body thermometer/(literary) a person's appearance
five viscera and six bowels (TCM)
rule (e.g. of science)/law of behavior/regular pattern/rhythm/discipline
joint (physiology)/key point/critical phase
yin and yang
to correspond/a correspondence/corresponding/homologous/matching with sth/counterpart
five viscera of TCM, namely: heart 心[xin1], liver 肝[gan1], spleen 脾[pi2], lungs 肺[fei4] and kidneys 腎|肾[shen4]
